hostilenetworks.trivia.basalz:
The much bulkier cousin
of our flammable friend.
Bestowed with earthen strength.
hostilenetworks.trivia.blitz:
A wind elemental
by another name.
Fortunately, they lack control
of thunder.
hostilenetworks.trivia.blizz:
Take a Blaze
and remove the heat.
The resulting husk is
the icy Blizz.
hostilenetworks.trivia.thermal_elemental:
A combination of all
the Thermal mobs into one.
It is only stable
 in a simulation.
